## Workspace.iterateAllLeaves() method

Iterate through all leaves, including main area leaves, floating leaves, and sidebar leaves.

**Signature:**

```typescript
iterateAllLeaves(callback: (leaf: WorkspaceLeaf) => any): void;
```
